reviews.review_msg: Gerardo was a great professor! He is passionate about the material, which was contagious. We always went to class excited to talk about politics. Quite a few readings but flexible w/ due dates. I learned a lot in his class and he is a kind, caring, and compassionate professor who genuinely cares about his students success and well-being.

Enjoyed class and learned a lot. A lot of weekly writing, but the criteria were clear and this meant the workload was more spread out over the semester. Readings were heavy into sociology at the start, but became more interesting (for me) over time. His political ideology is apparent in class, but he is always open for dissenting views.
